metadata.description: The horror epic continues! When Ed was tagged, he found himself cursed to become a literal member of the walking dead -- physically decaying, but still able to think and speak. Terrified, he found the next victim he had to tag to pass along the curse. It's years later, and Ed can't live with the guilt of passing along the curse. So he decides -- to stop it? How can one ordinary man hope to halt the advance of a curse that crosses centuries? A descent into hard-edged darkness and despair!
metadata.name: Tag: Cursed
